channel.title: ddjscience on new/s/leak
channel.description: Recent content in ddjscience on new/s/leak

item.title: Science + Data Journalsim = new/s/leak
item.description: On January 1st, we officially started to build our “Network of Searchable Leaks” or, in short: new/s/leak. Our goal is to put the lastest reseearch of language technolgy and data visualization together to help journalists keeping their heads over water when meeting a dataset like the famous Cablegate. The idea is to have a network of all actors (people, organizations, places) and show who will do what, with whom, where, and when.
